raw_comment:
continued: This relates to myself and my community as I am a junior in high school and will be starting the college admissions process shortly. It is unfair that the most wealthy individuals and legacy students have such a drastic advantage compared to myself and my classmates even if we may be more qualified. 
Legacy: E Loophole in the Ivy League and Elite Colleges Admissions Process?
ace_sentences: This issue relates to my community.
I am a junior in high school.
I will start the college admissions process shortly.
The most wealthy individuals have a drastic advantage in the college admissions process.
Legacy students have a drastic advantage in the college admissions process.
I may be more qualified than a wealthy individual.
My classmates may be more qualified than a wealthy individual.
I may be more qualified than a legacy student.
My classmates may be more qualified than a legacy student.
The headline is: Legacy: A loophole in the Ivy League and elite colleges admissions process?
